title: [GAMEPLAY] Enemy champions missing particle effects and attack animations present.
body:
Last game I played the jungler and top laner were compleetly invisible except for their attack animations and their particle effects. Their models were completely invisible which made them untargatable. Even the announcer didn't announce when they died it just said Unknown_Champion has been slain and a blue box. When I opened up tab it only displayed 3 players on the other team. 

Needless to say we lost and I got blamed for it  because the invisible untargatble jungler ganked me several times and I ended up being 4/11.

This makes me want to never play another game of League ever again. 

This is absolutely unacceptable.

replies.body:
Hey TheMentalLizard,

From the sounds of it, you may have some jumbled files. I would suggest a client repair. 

- Open the LoL Client
- Click the [?] in the upper right hand corner of the client. 
- Select [Repair]

This should correct any misplaced files in the game and prevent this from happening in the future. If you're still experiencing this after the repair, please [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=34190) so we can further help troubleshoot the issue.
